column2: "The ARKS that Regius and them sacrificed their bodies for to protect in such a sorry state. Fufu, hahahahaha!"
"If you had distanced your defiant faces, you might have lived a little longer. Isn't that regrettable?"
"...Why are you doing this? What do you think we are?!"
"What a thing to say. Weren't you ARKS originally the toys of the Photoners?"
"It's not just you guys. Everything in this vast universe is to me... A test site, my playground."
"And when you're done playing with your toys, you toss them aside. Isn't that obvious?"
"Now, Xion... Planet Xion, become one with me...!"
"...Wonderful. Amazing. This is magnificent!"
"Knowledge, it's rushing into my head. Ah, ah! It feels like it's going to burst! This torrent of information!"
"Fufu, too bad, Regius. Your existence in your chest can't love even once."
"Your first sacrifices were useless. In the end, you couldn't protect the ARKS!"
"...Haha, worthless Casra! The roots of your predecessors, are you holding on to them?"
"You're the same, you throw me off you know?"
"...and <%me>, you were too slow."
"You, and her, Xion's kin. You guys, no longer have any worth."
"Xion...!"
"1. I don't accept defeat!"
"2. It won't end here!"
"3. Is this it...?"
"<%me>...! ...What you did wasn't wrong, it wasn't...!"
"What's this? Still feel like struggling? The ARKS' habits of endeavouring futilely is pretty troubling."
"In the end, the evil when you neared death infected even her... really, such a bother."
"...I don't understand. Xion's already gone, you know? What motivates you so?"
"1. I promised."
"2. I won't... let it end this way"
"3. ...I don't know."
"Those that pushed us forward... Xion who guided us this far... we promised them...!"
"A promise with Xion? A promise with the ones who just died? Either one is meaningless now."
"Those things, in front of omniscience, are all worthless!"
"No, because it's omniscience, it's worthless."
"Wha... my body...!"
"X... Xion...! You, what are you...?!"
"These... thoughts, that are flooding in...! They're... Xion's!?"
"Xion! You, you can't...!"
"<%me>. This is my last request, that I couldn't say that time."
"Stop... Xion...! Stop thinking that!"
"The you that I know... the you I yearned for... would never think that!"
"<%me>. You, with those hands..."
"With those hands, kill me."
"There is no other time. There is no other time where Luther will be one with me."
"The controlling him, the calculating me, now that we're fused completely... cut the ARKS loose from us."
"To cut them loose from being at his mercy, but that means there's an opening to win. That is now, this moment."
"But, then... that means...!"
"...My gentle kin. For those kind thoughts, I'm happy."
"But, there's no time to waver. I can't resist for very long... if you don't kill me, everyone will die."
"...fufu, it's just like a threat. But, this is a request."
"You who touched me, you two know me, you two can kill me. You can make me disappear."
"Even if Luther's body remains, if the me inside him is erased, his objective completely falls apart."
"...<%me>. The final ARKS member to understand me. My request, please fulfill it."
"Xion! You... Do you even understand what you're saying?!"
"What? I thought I didn't need to teach you that, Luther."
"As I'm fused with you, I'm returning the controls and calculations. And for disappearing, I mean this is the end."
"Stop...! Stop that stupidity, Xion!"
"If you die, everything ends! Oracle, those things! They originate from you!"
"But if this continues, the ARKS will die, right? It's not a very balanced statement."
"N- No! Stop it Xion! If you die, when that happens, do you know what will happen?!"
"What are you saying, Luther?"
"This thing called the future... is only fun when you don't understand it."
